snippet: Alaska Airlines’ roots go back to the 1930s, long before Alaska’s statehood, and to this day many of its destinations are inaccessible by road. But over the last 20 years, the airline has expanded into Mexico, Hawaii and elsewhere in the United...
lead_paragraph: Alaska Airlines’ roots go back to the 1930s, long before Alaska’s statehood, and to this day many of its destinations are inaccessible by road. But over the last 20 years, the airline has expanded into Mexico, Hawaii and elsewhere in the United States.
